ErrorMsg.value: No RAW Data Available For AllSourceCustomers

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWFIRSTNAME,
RAWMIDDLENAME,
RAWLASTNAME,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
DO_NOT_SELL 
FROM Masterdata_CDP.RetailCustomersIncremental 
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWEMAILADDRESS,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.EmailAddressesIncremental 
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWPHONENUMBER,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.PhoneNumbersIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWSTREETADDRESS,
RAWADDRESSLINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATEORPROVINCECODE,
RAWZIPOSTALCODE,
RAWCOUNTRYCODE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER
FROM Masterdata_CDP.AddressLocationsIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID}'

DELETE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[AllSourceCustomers] where customerMasterId<=@{activity('Get_Max_CustomerMasterID').output.firstRow.MAX_ID} ;
SELECT 1 as success;

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(customerMasterId) as MAX_ID FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[AllSourceCustomers] WITH(NOLOCK)
